abstract: United States embassy in Jordan warns American citizens to avoid shopping malls in capital of Amman for several days due to threat of terrorist attacks.
lead_paragraph: The United States Embassy in Jordan on Wednesday warned American citizens to avoid high-end shopping malls in Amman, the capital, because of credible threats of terrorist attacks.

headline.main: Jordan: U.S. Warns of Threat to Malls
headline.print_headline: Jordan: U.S. Warns of Threat to Malls

snippet: The United States Embassy in Jordan on Wednesday warned American citizens to avoid high-end shopping malls in Amman, the capital, because of credible threats of terrorist attacks.
